parameters.gross_income:
Gross income with levels Under 2,600,
2,600 to 5,200, 5,200 to 10,400, 10,400 to 15,600,
15,600 to 20,800, 20,800 to 28,600, 28,600 to 36,400,
Above 36,400, Refused and Unknown.
parameters.amt_weekends: Number of cigarettes smoked per day on weekends.
parameters.smoke: Smoking status with levels No and Yes
parameters.highest_qualification:
Highest education level with levels
A Levels, Degree, GCSE/CSE, GCSE/O Level,
Higher/Sub Degree, No Qualification, ONC/BTEC and
Other/Sub Degree
parameters.region:
Region with levels London, Midlands & East Anglia,
Scotland, South East, South West, The North
and Wales
parameters.amt_weekdays: Number of cigarettes smoked per day on weekdays.
parameters.gender: Gender with levels Female and Male.
parameters.type:
Type of cigarettes smoked with levels Packets,
Hand-Rolled, Both/Mainly Packets and Both/Mainly Hand-Rolled
parameters.nationality:
Nationality with levels British, English,
Irish, Scottish, Welsh, Other, Refused
and Unknown.
parameters.marital_status:
Marital status with levels Divorced,
Married, Separated, Single and Widowed.
parameters.ethnicity:
Ethnicity with levels Asian, Black,
Chinese, Mixed, White and Refused
Unknown.

reference:
National STEM Centre, Large Datasets from stats4schools,
https://www.stem.org.uk/resources/elibrary/resource/28452/large-datasets-stats4schools.
description:
Description
Survey data on smoking habits from the UK. The dataset can be used for
analyzing the demographic characteristics of smokers and types of tobacco
consumed.
title: UK Smoking Data
format: A data frame with 1691 observations on the following 12 variables.
